"The Seasonal Event":
"Seasonal Events are special events that only last for a limited time.

During these events, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change.

In addition, the ARKS Logistical Support Staff member, Xitrae, appears in all ARKS bases to act as a guide for the event.

Xitrae will offer you Limited Time Tasks, and will also trade items in exchange for Seasonal Points."

"By talking to Xitrae, you can accept Tasks related to the event.

You will be also assigned additional Daily/Weekly Tasks, also related to the event."

"During this Seasonal Event, an unusual holographic symbol called a \"Mischief Symbol\" will appear in Exploration Sections.

You will also receive limited-time Tasks that ask you to find this Mischief Symbol.

You can locate the Mischief Symbol by using your Mag Sonar."

"There will also be Limited Time Special Scratches, which you need a special ticket to draw from.

These Scratch Tickets can be obtained from Limited Time Emergency Quest and Limited Time Item Exchange Shops.

You can learn more about Seasonal Events by talking to Xitrae and selecting \"Ask about the Seasonal Event\"."
